Performance Targets
- Matrix Multiplication: 5.0x vs PyTorch (current 3.0x)
- Attention Mechanism: 4.0x vs FlashAttention  
- End-to-End Inference: 3.5x vs TorchScript
- Memory Efficiency: 50% reduction vs baseline

# Kubernetesé›†æˆ

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: yica-inference-service
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: yica-inference
  template:
    spec:
      containers:

        image: yicaai/yica-yirage:latest
        resources:
          limits:
            yica.ai/cim-arrays: 512
            memory: 16Gi
          requests:
            yica.ai/cim-arrays: 256
            memory: 8Gi

â° æ—¶é—´çº¿å’Œé‡Œç¨‹ç¢‘ïƒ

æ—¶é—´

é‡Œç¨‹ç¢‘

éªŒæ”¶æ ‡å‡†

1æœˆåº•
